description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Work in fintech/insurtech start-up projects with trendiest technologies: blockchain, chatbot, .NET Core, Microservice, ReactJs...
              
              -	Work directly with startup founders from Singapore, Australia, UK, Switzerland...  who has crazily smart ideas but also emphasizes on efficiency
              
              -	Work in a small closed team where you are encouraged and supported to try things out, innovate and develop
              
              -	Work in a flexible and result oriented environment
              

              Working conditions
              
              -	Time: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
              
              -	Venue: 170D/2A Phan Dang Luu, Ward 3, Phu Nhuan District , HCMC.
              

              Application
              
              -	The sooner the better
              
              -	English CV required
              
              -	CVs with photograph preferred
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Essential to have:
              
              -	Be passionate about software development
              
              -	C#.NET 4.0/4.5 (especially ASP.NET Web API 2 and ASP.NET MVC 5)
              
              -	Entity Framework 6
              
              -	SQL Server 2008 (or above)
              
              -	Object-oriented design, dependency injection, design patterns
              
              -	Web development skills (e.g HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, jQuery)
              
              -	Ability to analyse requirements
              
              -	Ability of self-learning
              
              -	Good English speaking and writing skills
              
              -	Good logical thinking
              
              -	Hard-working and careful
              
              -	Good problem-solving skills
              
              -	Good sense of product
              

              Very good to have:
              
              -	Experience working on multi-tenant enterprise applications
              
              -	Domain-Driven Design (DDD), CQRS, micro ORMs
              
              -	Team Foundation Server and Continuous Integration
              
              -	Agile methodologies (e.g. Scrum and KanBan)
              
              -	Microsoft Office Applications (Excel, Word, Outlook and good to have Visio)
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                -	Competitive salary + 13th payment + additional performance bonus
               







                -	Coaching, training and opportunities to work overseas
               







                -	12 annual leave days + 10 full paid sick leave days + 2 company trips/year + Health Insurance
